These sources provide the information for species accounts for the birds on the IUCN Red List.}

textAfterTable: Population & trend   Estimate Data quality Derivation Year of estimate No. of mature individuals 0 Population trend Stable - Number of subpopulations - - - Largest subpopulation - - - Generation length (yrs) 5.5 - - - Population justification: The global population size has not been quantified, but the species is described as generally common (del Hoyo et al. 2006). Trend justification: The population is suspected to be stable in the absence of evidence for any declines or substantial threats.
